description: This table contains the history of edits for a dental finding record.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DENTAL_PATIENT_CSN
columns.description: Stores the patient encounter in which a particular contact of the record was modified if it was available.

columns.name: DENTAL_MOD_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who modified a piece of dental data in the finding record.

columns.name: DENTAL_MOD_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date and time when a piece of dental data in the finding record was modified

columns.name: DEN_FIND_STAT_HIS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The history of the finding's status (unaddressed, resolved, removed, etc.)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Addressed


Unaddressed


Resolved


Removed


Auto Resolved


Auto Resolved Untoggled

columns.name: TOO_FIND_TYPE_H_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the history of the finding type of a tooth-level finding


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


PARL


Needs Extraction


Caries


Fracture


Impacted


Monitor


Defective Restoration


Bleeding


Suppuration


Mobility


Furcation


Plaque


Calculus


Retained Root


Missing


Other

columns.name: DENT_CHRON_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: This is the date and time the documentation was made for, such as when documenting past historical data.

columns.name: CARIES_CLASS_HIST_C_NAME
columns.description:
The history of the finding's caries classification


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


I


II


III


IV


V


VI


E1


E2


D1


D2


D3


C1


C2

columns.name: CARIES_DEPTH_HIST
columns.description: The history of the finding's caries depth

columns.name: DENT_FUR_CLASS_HX_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the history of the severity of furcation documented on a tooth.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Class I


Class II


Class III


Class IV

columns.name: DENT_MOB_CLASS_HX_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the history of a tooth's mobility classification, which is its severity of mobility.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Class I


Class II


Class III

columns.name: CARIES_INCIP_HX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The history of whether a caries finding is incipient


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Incipient


Incipient

columns.name: DENT_PERIFIND_SEVERITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the history of the level of severity for a periodontal finding. It contains the periodontal finding severity category ID for the finding.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Slight


Moderate


Severe
